description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hammerball is the latest bloodsport from the world of Colosseum. Two teams face off in a fast-paced and deadly mix of hockey and gateball. Equipped with a big war hammer you have to smash your way through your opponents and get the ball in the goal.
description.short: Hammerball is the latest bloodsport from the world of Colosseum. Two teams face off in a fast-paced and deadly mix of hockey and gateball. Equipped with a big war hammer you have to smash your way through your opponents and get the ball in the goal.
